page.title: 06A LOCAL ANSTEY TRAMP.
page.content: There is a tramp who roams around Anstey. His nickname is White _eye because he has a white eyebrow. He is 38 years old and he says his parents were millionares. He was once married but his wife threw him out of his own home. He goes from house to house trying to get food and water. People often see white eye in the streets with a carrier bag in his hand and looking very scruffy. He usually sleeps rough or in barns. Many people in Anstey tell stories about him, such as he finds cigarettes ends and looks for paper to roll his own cigarettes. I often see him walking by my house. I think he must do the same route every day. Some people are scared of him, some people feel sorry for him. By Alix Smith Aged 11, Rebecca Dickons Aged 9.
